title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! This fast-paced and exciting game is perfect for ages 8 and up, making it a great choice for family game nights.

The game includes two decks of cards, one for kids and one for adults, with a total of 260 cards. The kids deck features familiar guess words, while the adult deck offers a varied selection of over 1,000 guess words. Each deck also has specific forbidden words that players must avoid.

To add some extra fun to the game, it includes a squeaker and a one-minute timer. The timer adds a sense of urgency to the gameplay, making each round even more exciting.

The objective of the game is to get your teammates to guess the words on the cards without saying any of the forbidden words. Be careful, as saying a forbidden word will result in a point for the opposing team!

With the winning condition being the team with the most points, the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game is sure to bring out the competitive spirit in everyone. Get ready for hours of laughter and friendly competition with this fantastic board game.

Trust in the brand Hasbro Gaming, a renowned manufacturer of entertaining and high-quality games. Don't miss out on the opportunity to bring this exciting family board game into your home. Order yours today and start creating unforgettable memories with your loved ones!

Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! This exciting game is perfect for players aged 8 and up, making it a great choice for family game nights. 

In this fast-paced game, players will be divided into teams, with kids and parents competing against each other. The objective of the game is to guess words without saying any of the forbidden words. The team with the most points at the end of the game will be the winner!

The game includes two decks of cards, with a total of 260 cards. The kids' deck contains familiar guess words, while the adult deck features over 1,000 varied guess words. Each deck also has a set of forbidden words to make the game more challenging. The kids' deck has 1 guess word and 2 forbidden words per card, while the adult deck has 1 guess word and a varying number of forbidden words.

To add excitement to the gameplay, the game also includes a squeaker and a one-minute timer. The timer duration adds an element of urgency to each round, making it even more thrilling.

With its engaging gameplay and the opportunity for some friendly competition between kids and parents, the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game is sure to provide hours of entertainment. Don't miss out on the fun - grab your own copy today!
